nbt.description: The NBT data to check for.
nbt.markdownDescription: The NBT data to check for.

type.description:
## NBT

---



[Item Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_condition_types/nbt)

Checks the item's NBT.

Type ID: `origins:nbt`




---

### Examples

```json
"item_condition": {
    "type": "origins:nbt",
    "nbt": "{exampleCustomTag: 1b}"
}
```

This example will check if the item stack has the `exampleCustomTag: 1b` NBT.
